description:
This apartment is in a fully renovated building on the Upper East Side. Minutes away from all of NYC's attractions such as museums, 5th avenue and central park! A few blocks away from both the Q and 6 trains.This is a great place for someone who wants to explore NYC. The kitchen and bathroom are fully functional.

The area is great with many bars and restaurants. You are also a few blocks away from the 2nd avenue and Lexington avenue subway line, central park, east river park and all the museums NYC has to offer.

I do live a few blocks away so I will be available at all times.

All the restaurants and bars! I also love how accessible the rest of the city is to me because of the subways.

2nd avenue subway line is less than a 7 minute walk and the Lexington avenue subway line is less than 5 minutes away
name: Modern place on the Upper East side
review: The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
